mapper.select: SELECT T1.USER_ID AS USER_ID ,T1.USER_PASS AS USER_PASS ,trim(T1.USER_ROLE) AS USER_ROLE ,'insert,get,delete,update' AS USER_Permission FROM SYS_USER T1 LEFT JOIN SYS_LOC_LATN T2 ON T1.LATN_ID=T2.LATN_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_DEPART T3 ON T1.DEPART_ID = T3.DEPART_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE T4 ON T1.USER_ROLE = T4.ROLE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND T1.USER_ID like '%'|| #{userId}||'%'
